hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git\s+commit'; then staged=$(git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=d 2>/dev/null); js_files=$(echo "$staged" | grep -E '\.(js|ts|jsx|tsx)$' || true); py_files=$(echo "$staged" | grep -E '\.py$' || true); if [ -n "$js_files" ] && command -v npx &>/dev/null; then echo "$js_files" | xargs npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern 2>/dev/null || { echo 'BLOCKED: ESLint errors found. Fix before committing.'; exit 2; }; fi; if [ -n "$py_files" ] && command -v python3 &>/dev/null; then echo "$py_files" | xargs python3 -m ruff check 2>/dev/null || { echo 'BLOCKED: Ruff lint errors found. Fix before committing.'; exit 2; }; fi; fi; exit 0
